letter:
With expertise in React (React.js, Next.js, React Native), Node.js, and modern web technologies, I am confident in my ability to contribute effectively.
I have developed e-commerce solutions with Shopify and Liquid, as well as custom CMS-based and corporate platforms.
My experience includes building scalable apps, optimizing UI/UX, and ensuring seamless API integrations.
I thrive in international teams and have a strong grasp of agile development.
